jobDescription: We are looking for a Senior Game Artist to join our growing team! At Seepia, Artists are in charge of the visual aspect of the ad experience. They make sure our ads look and sound spectacular while staying true to the style and spirit of each client. Join us in pioneering this  exciting frontier of game advertising and help us push our projects to new heights.
requirements:
Who we think will do great in this role has:
Excellent Photoshop skills: We're looking for both image editing and digital art skills
Experience in creating VFX or animations (Spine or 3D)
Solid knowledge of game assets: You should be familiar with standard game industry jargon and know what kind of building blocks games are made of
Efficient communication skills: Our typical projects are around 2 weeks in duration and we expect our artists to fluently communicate with the project manager and complete their tasks on time
Stylistic flexibility: Our clients come in all styles from cute and cartoony to painterly realism or even complete abstraction - you should be able to adjust to each project and stay true to the style of the client
An amazing online portfolio or showreel: We are especially interested in seeing game screen mockups, in-game art assets, VFX, and animations
Ability to communicate both in written and spoken English

We’d love if you have some of these:
Game industry experience
3D skills 
UI/UX design skills
Vectoring skills
Graphic design skills
responsibilities:
What you’ll do:
Help our sales team bring their vision to life through your art
Collaborate with our designers and creating beautiful and intuitive layouts
Work together with our developers in making some of the best playable ads in the world
Share tasks with our artists on gorgeous high profile game projects
benefits:
What we offer:
Healthy work-life balance and flexible work hours - structure your work around your life, not the other way around
Option to work either remotely or in our beautiful office in Lappeenranta, right next to Lake Saimaa (relocation assistance can be provided)
A laid-back, supportive and friendly team of professionals and game enthusiasts :)

jobDescription: We are looking for a Senior HTML Game Developer to join our rapidly growing team. At Seepia, Game Developers design and build new systems from scratch and optimize features to be both performant and moddable. You will work on short projects in a small team with art, design, QA and management experts to make our playable ads come to life.
requirements:
Who we think will do great in this role has:
5+ years of game programming experience
Strong working knowledge of modern Javascript and HTML5
Experience building the front-end of applications with appealing visual design
Knowledge and practical experience of game production
Is a self-motivated team player with and time-management skills
Ability  to communicate both in written and spoken English
Ability to work in a proactive and flexible environment

We’d love if you have some of these:
Experience in game industry and with mobile games
Experience with Unity, high-level scripting languages, version-control, CMS systems, client/server networking
Experience with Photoshop, Illustrator, other graphic design and layout tools
Passion to work in all parts of software development life cycle
Genuine interest in interactive advertising and games
responsibilities:
What you’ll do:
Develop well performing ads and games using HTML5 / Typescript
Support the team with your technical knowledge from initial designs to final delivery
Create your own schedules and manage your tasks
Identify, communicate and resolve performance and scalability issues
Mentor junior members of our team
benefits:
What we offer:
Healthy work-life balance and flexible work hours - structure your work around your life, not the other way around
Option to work either remotely or in our beautiful office in Lappeenranta, right next to Lake Saimaa (relocation assistance can be provided)
A laid-back, supportive and friendly team of professionals and game enthusiasts :)

specialities: Game Development,End-to-End Software Development Lifecycle,Gameplay Development
jobDescription: Are you a highly skilled and motivated Tech Lead with a passion for gaming? Join our dynamic team at Nitro Games and work with exciting and well-known IPs! We are looking for an experienced professional to tackle complex technical challenges and ensure our projects' successful and timely delivery. As a Tech Lead, you will be crucial in designing and coding new features, optimizing performance, setting up build pipelines, and collaborating with various teams to bring our innovative ideas to life. If you thrive in a collaborative environment and deeply love to play games on various platforms , this is the perfect opportunity!
requirements:
+15 years of experience in Tech

Strong knowledge of C++ design and programming 

Proven experience in a senior/lead role on multiple game projects, with at least some of them using a Proprietary C++ engine

Strong knowledge of gameplay programming

Ability to quickly get familiar with existing codebase

Experience using Windows/Mac

Knowledge of shader languages and render pipelines

Understanding and appreciation of optimized code

Understanding of CI/CD pipeline

Strong experience of working with LUA

Experience implementing native ios/android features

Strong knowledge of Jira and Confluence

In-depth knowledge of game development concepts, algorithms, and software design principles.

Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to analyze and optimize code for performance

Love for games, including interest in free-to-play mobile games

Knowledge of Warframe is considered a positive
responsibilities:
Ability to independently design and code entire new features in a performant manner according to established coding conventions.

Effectively communicate technical solutions and approaches in verbal and written form.

Able to work well in a collaborative team environment and within an iterative design process.

Debugging, troubleshooting complex issues, and optimizing code for speed, memory, and overall performance.

Follow the end-to-end software development lifecycle, from design and coding to testing and deployment.

Develop high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code by project requirements and coding standards.

Independent dialogue and collaboration with the client.

Setting up and maintaining build pipelines for both iOS and Android devices.

Implement platform native SDKs such as Singular etc.

Collaborate with different teams.

Ability to travel occasionally and participate in business calls over timezones.
benefits:
At Nitro Games, we pride ourselves on fostering a world-class, self-directed team that values work-life balance and supports family life. We offer the flexibility to work remotely, hybrid, or from our offices in Kotka or Helsinki, with full relocation support and language classes available for people moving to Finland.

Our benefits package includes comprehensive healthcare and cultural benefits like retreats and parties, ensuring your well-being both inside and outside of work. Our unique self-development program allows you to dedicate work hours to personal and professional growth, ensuring you stay at the cutting edge of your field. Additionally, take advantage of our generous stock option plan, a performance-based bonus system tied to EBIT, and extra paid holidays to relax and recharge!

The salary range is between 6500€ and 8500€ per month. The monthly salary can be negotiated to match your experience, skillset, and range of responsibilities in the role.

jobTitle: Senior Technical Artist with Graphics Programming Expertise
jobDescription:
Are you a seasoned developer with a flair for art and a passion for AI technology?

We are seeking a Senior Technical Artist with graphics programming skills to join a very experienced game development team in Helsinki. 

Join the dynamic and innovative team, where you will have the opportunity to shape the future of game creation by blending your technical skills with your artistic vision.

This is an exciting role for someone with at least 3 years of game development experience in using Unity and a passion for visual effects and graphics.

Location requirement: for this role you have to be based in Finland.
requirements:
3+ years of experience in game development with a focus on graphics programming and shader development,
Proficient in Unity and C# with an understanding of real-time 3D game development,
Experience with 3D tools like Blender for tweaking and refining game assets,
Interest in AI technology and its application in game development.
responsibilities:
Develop and fine-tune shaders to create stunning visual effects that are dynamic and responsive to AI-driven commands.
Collaborate closely with a very senior team of engineers and artists to push the boundaries of no-code game creation. 
Work with AI technologies to create seamless, visually appealing 3D game environments.
Use your artistic eye to ensure that all assets and visual elements meet the stylistic requirements of the game.
benefits:
Flexible Work Environment: Enjoy the benefits of a fully remote work setup with occasional in-person meetings in Helsinki.
Cutting-Edge Technology: Work with the latest AI and graphics tools to create revolutionary gaming experiences.
Collaborative Culture: Join a small, dedicated team where your contributions are highly valued and impactful.
Growth Opportunities: Be part of a growing startup that's leading the charge in democratizing game development, offering everyone the chance to become a game creator.

skills: Autodesk Maya,Adobe Creative Cloud,UV Mapping,3D Texturing,Rigging
jobDescription:
An adventurous game studio in Helsinki is seeking a Senior 3D Artist (Generalist) with a passion for crafting immersive, movement-based gaming worlds.

If you’re an experienced artist with at least 3 years of experience within the games industry and eager to contribute to visually appealing games this is your chance to bring innovative game concepts to life and leave your creative mark! 

Location Requirements:
Must be based in Finland, preferably in the Helsinki Metropolitan area.
This role requires you to be in the Helsinki office at least 3 days per week.
requirements:
3+ years of professional 3D art experience in the games industry,
Proficiency in 3D software such as Maya,
Skilled in Adobe Creative Cloud, including Illustrator, Photoshop, and Substance Painter,
Experience with game engines like Unity,
Strong attention to detail and excellent communication skills,
Ability to manage multiple projects independently,
Ability to create concepts and iterate based on feedback.
responsibilities:
Create high-quality 3D models that align with diverse game art styles.
Implement shading, UV mapping, texturing, lighting, rigging, and animations.
Collaborate with other team members to bring concepts to life.
Optimise models for performance and refine assets based on feedback.
Contribute to multiple projects simultaneously
benefits:
Creative Freedom: Work in an environment that values innovation and creativity,
Collaborative Culture: Join a team that prioritises teamwork, respect, and mutual support,
Fun-Focused: Contribute to creating engaging and enjoyable gaming experiences,
Growth Opportunities: Be part of a studio where your input drives the evolution of our games.
